# The number of intersections is the number of ways to choose 2 diagonals from the total diagonals.
# The total number of diagonals is the number of ways to choose 2 vertices from the total vertices.
# The number of ways to choose 2 vertices from n vertices is n choose 2.
# n choose 2 = n! / (2! * (n - 2)!)
# n! = n * (n - 1) * (n - 2) * ... * 2 * 1
# n! / 2! = n * (n - 1) * (n - 2) * ... * 2
# n! / (2! * (n - 2)!) = n * (n - 1)

n = int(input())
print(n * (n - 1) // 2)
